definition: Li Heng, personal name of thirteenth Tang emperor Muzong 穆宗[Mu4 Zong1] (795-824), reigned 821-825
permanent/constant/fixed/usual/ordinary/rule (old)/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷟)

sentences.english: Li Heng attorney office is located between Shanghai and Zhengzhou.

sentences.english: Mr. Li Heng , I'm from the local newspaper the Weekly Post.
sentences.chinese: 李恒先生，我是来自当地《每周邮报》的记者。
